doc: is a simple material in terms of rendering that relies on a 2d spherical environment map and a 2d diffuse map to render semi glossy like finishes like clear coated paint. It additionally shades the lower hemisphere by the color set in postHemiFilter.

properties.name: normalScaling
properties.doc: Specifies a factor to be applied to the normal.

properties.name: normalDisturb
properties.doc: Specifies a disturbance factor that will be added to the normal

properties.name: postVertexColor
properties.doc: Specifies the factor which controls how much of the per vertex color we want to transmit.

properties.name: postHemiFilter
properties.doc: Specifies the color to be applied to the lower hemisphere. It is multiplied like a negative diffuse light coming from below.

properties.name: postGain
properties.doc: Specifies the gain factor to be applied to the final result.

properties.name: reflectionMap
properties.doc: Specifies the spherical environment map to use. It is expected to be in sRGB color space.

properties.name: reflectionGain
properties.doc: Specifies the gain factor to be applied to the spherical environment map lookup.

properties.name: reflectionInnerFilter
properties.doc: Specifies the inner color filter to be applied based on fresnel on the spherical environment map lookup.

properties.name: reflectionOuterFilter
properties.doc: Specifies the outer color filter to be applied based on fresnel on the spherical environment map lookup.

properties.name: usesReflectionMap
properties.doc: Specifies whether we use a reflection map or not.

properties.name: projectReflectionMap
properties.doc: Specifies whether equirectangular projection should be used for lookups on the reflection map.

properties.name: diffuseInnerFilter
properties.doc: Specifies the inner color filter to be applied based on fresnel on the diffuse map lookup.

properties.name: diffuseOuterFilter
properties.doc: Specifies the outer color filter to be applied based on fresnel on the diffuse map lookup.

properties.name: diffuseMap
properties.doc: Specifies the diffuse map to use. It is expected to be in sRGB color space.

properties.name: diffuseGain
properties.doc: Specifies the gain factor to be applied to the diffuse map lookup.

properties.name: usesDiffuseMap
properties.doc: Specifies whether we use a diffuse map or not.

properties.name: gltfYUp
properties.doc: Specifies whether this material should consider the Y and Z axis as being inverted.
